# remove(at:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the specified child from this entity.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func remove(at index: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the child entity to remove from the collection.
title: remove(at:)
